TopicTitle: KSP keeps crashing while loading save game.

Articles.Content:
My KSP keeps crashing when I try to open Save Game.  Just Installed a few mods more and well, crashes.

I download my mods through CKAN, would be weird if a mod would be incompatible. Also shouldn't it be a RAM problem since I recently Upgraded to 64gigs of RAM.

Here's my KSP.log:
